> \define b()<

> This plugin is an alternative to packaging a plugin using [[Node.js|http://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlyWiki%20on%20Node.js]] or the [[browser developer console|http://tiddlywiki.com/dev/#How%20to%20create%20plugins%20in%20the%20browser]]. This plugin adds the <> ''shadow'' button to the View Toolbar and also the <> plugintools tab to the Sidebar. The View Toolbar button becomes <> ''plugged'' when selected and then the tiddler title appears in the list of tiddlers to be packed on the <> Sidebar tab. The list can be sorted using {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} ''up-arrow'' to move up the item in the list or by drag and drop. To drag an item, select it, then hold down the mouse or track-pad button while you drag it to a new location in the list. Release the button to drop the item into place. Unneeded plugin tiddlers can be removed from the list by using the <> ''plugged'' button in the tiddler or on the plugintools tab on the Sidebar. The ''Pack Plugin'' button on the sidebar tab opens the plugin template in edit view and fills in the dependents field. Set the plugin title, e.g. $:/plugins/yourname/pluginname, and also the following fields on the tiddler: |!Field |!Value | |''description'' |Plugin description | |''list'' |Names of exposed plugin information tiddlers, for example: readme license | |''name'' |Plugin name (only needed for themes) | |''plugin-type'' |Either "plugin" for a regular plugin, "theme" for a theme, or "language" for a language pack | |[[additional|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Plugin%20Fields]] |Add as needed | Remove tiddlers by only selecting tiddlers you want in the plugin and hit ''Pack Plugin'' again. [[Export|https://tiddlywiki.com/#How%20to%20export%20tiddlers]] the plugin using JSON format for library format. This plugin comprises: * Icon * Template * Stylesheet * Sidebar tab * Caption and hint","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar":{"text":"\define move() +[move:-1[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define a() \define drop-actions()<$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]'/> Plugin title:<$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' field='name' placeholder='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin'/><$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]]'>

<$droppable actions=<>>

dependents={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list!!list}}/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-edit-tiddler' $param=<>/>Pack
